name: Aerial Evasion
description:
A free short airplane shooter game where the player must evade hostile enemies and destroy enemy structures. Play as a jet and use your machine gun, bombs, and missiles to destroy enemy buildings, aircraft, and ships. 

Please feel free to comment any bugs, issues, or other concerns you may have with the game. 

In addition we do appreciate feedback so if you can find the time please fill out the survey linked below so that we can further improve your experience with this and/or upcoming projects.

Once again thanks for playing and enjoy the rest of your day.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdUs2LqBvIlopFq5KkD8QUaoNIQG--0AJxmIvko...
